testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.register plugin to handlebars

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.register plugin to handlebars
testcase.name: should register the component helper to Handlebars

testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.test required and optional options

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test required and optional options
testcase.name: should require "name" to be defined if neither "name" or "view" is defined

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test required and optional options
testcase.name: should set "view" to "index" if "view" is not defined

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test required and optional options
testcase.name: should require "name" to be defined when "version" is present

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test required and optional options
testcase.name: should add all the necessary JSON dependencies

testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.test default options and error cases

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test default options and error cases
testcase.name: should use the current component when "name" is not defined

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test default options and error cases
testcase.name: should use the "error" component when the component is not found

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test default options and error cases
testcase.name: should use the "error" component when the view is not found
should use the required component when the authorization succeeds
should use the "error" component when authorization fails
should pass component level checks for dynamic conditions
should use the "error" component when component level dynamic conditions fail
should pass view level checks for dynamic conditions
should use the "error" component when view level dynamic conditions fail

testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.test that the components are added to the children for the parent

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test that the components are added to the children for the parent
testcase.name: must contain the correct child information

testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.test that the context is extended with custom attributes

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test that the context is extended with custom attributes
testcase.name: must extend the aggregated component with custom attributes

testsuite.name: Handlebars component helper.test component helper used as a block helper

testcase.classname: Handlebars component helper.test component helper used as a block helper
testcase.name: must add the context function as a key
